title: 09/27/21: Shortcut to send an email/notification to your employees + Filter by access profiles
content: New 1: Shortcut to send an email/notification to your employeesThis button  has been added to the employee file to be able to send an email or notification to the employee's mobile app with one click.⚠️The employee's email must be entered in the employee file. Method here.When you send a message, the employee receives an email + notification on the mobile app.The body of the message can only be read via email.New 2: Filter your employee file searches by profile accessEmprez now gives you the ability to filter the type of access profiles you want to search for.In the Employees menu, click on Search,Check the box(es) for the desired access profile(s),Then click Search, and the list of matching employee records will appear.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
